item.title: [one] Ichormoon Gauntlet
item.description:
Artifact

Planeswalkers you control have "[0]: Proliferate" and "[-12]: Take an extra turn after this one."

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, choose a counter on target permanent. Put an additional counter of that kind on that permanent.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/making-magic/phyrexia-all-will-be-one-direction-part-2

item.title: [one] Vat of Rebirth
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever another artifact or creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put an oil counter on Vat of Rebirth.

{2}{B}, {T}, Remove four oil counters from Vat of Rebirth: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://www.reddit.com/r/magicTCG/comments/10ji0fb/one_vat_of_rebirth_rmagictcg_preview_card/

item.title: [one] Trawler Drake
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Drake

Flying

Trawler Drake enters the battlefield with an oil counter on it.

Trawler Drake gets +1/+1 for each oil counter on it.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put an oil counter on Trawler Drake.

item.title: [one] Nahiri's Sacrifice
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature with mana value X.

Nahiri's Sacrifice deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

item.title: [one] Atraxa's Skitterfang
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Insect

Atraxa's Skitterfang enters the battlefield with three oil counters on it.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may remove an oil counter from Atraxa's Skitterfang. When you do, target creature you control gains your choice of flying, vigilance, deathtouch, or lifelink until end of turn.

https://www.gameshub.com/news/news/magic-the-gathering-mtg-phyrexia-all-will-be-one-card-preview-38983/

item.description:

Menace

item.description:
Instant

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If that permanent had mana value 3 or less, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{T}: Put an oil counter on The Filigree Sylex.

{T}, Sacrifice The Filigree Sylex: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of oil counters on The Filigree Sylex.

{T}, Remove ten oil counters from among permanents you control and sacrifice The Filigree Sylex: It deals 10 damage to any target.

item.title: [onc] Court of Grace
item.description:
Enchantment

When Court of Grace enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. If you're the monarch, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying instead.

item.title: [onc] Collective Effort
item.description:
Sorcery

Escalate—Tap an untapped creature you control. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or more —

• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.

item.title: [onc] Call the Coppercoats
item.description:
Instant

Strive — This spell costs {1}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

Choose any number of target opponents. Create X 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of creatures those opponents control.
